channel.title: Mentios - Development Team
channel.description:
I have decided to start a oldschoolish RSPS, that ain't a real remake but goodly done oldschoolish server.
To development of Mentios I will need: -Web Designer -Server Sided Coder -Client Sided Coder -Bug Finder/Tester
Possible revisions that we could use: 317-499.
It would be: Economic server with some couple of unique features, uses alot of mapspace for minigames, quests, mini quests, training locations, bosses and skills, which makes the server huge and non-boring.
You can apply and talk with me, here's how you can contact me: Skype: NexonLTD Windows Live Messenger (MSN): Paras-Best@Hotmail.com

item.title: Mentios - Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

SarantaRS:

that ain’t a real remake but goodly done oldschoolish server.

Wut?

On Topic: Go with 498.

Read full topic
